Instructors and Team Members

  • Sarah G.
    Instructor/Instructor Trainer
    Sarah G. is originally from Florida, Washington DC, and NYC (she’s moved around a lot). Boulder is now her home that she gratefully shares with Prairie Dogs instead of Subway Rats. Her husband tells her that she should have been a weather girl because when she is not in the studio you can find her staring at the radar app on her phone praying for a good storm.

    Tell us a secret? I own the same 50 lululemon tanks in different colors
    Favorite Food: Cheese Burgers and French Fries
    Favorite move on the bike? Chest Press with a little Tap Back.
    What I'm listening to: Daughtry - Long Live Rock & Roll
  • Carlos C.
    Co-Founder/Instructor
    Carlos C. is originally from Miami, Florida where he learned to roller blade on South Beach when he should have been in math class. A tumbler at heart, he's still trying to figure out how to incorporate trampolines into his riding regime.

    What would your super power be? Flying, fast and high!
    Favorite Dessert: Molten chocolate cake
    Favorite move on the bike? Four Corners.
    What I'm listening to: Current Obsessions
  • Hilary C.
    Co-Founder/Instructor
    A native of Manhattan, Hilary C. wishes cycling shoes came in platform style. Some day she hopes to reach both the North and South Poles to find the freshest powder on Earth.

    Secret Vice: Peppermint Candy Ice Cream
    Title I've held in the past: Cosmo Queen
    Words to live by: A diamond is a lump of coal that stuck with it.
    What I'm listening to: Smooth Ride
  • Tabitha F.
    Instructor
    After tolerating the English weather for 26 years, Tabitha F. migrated to Boulder, where she intends on staying forever. When not on a bike you might find her on a horse!

    What was your first concert? The Red Hot Chili Peppers
    Tell us a secret: I have more pairs of SPD cleats than I have heels
    Words to live by? Create your own reality.
    What I'm listening to: Labor Day Ride
  • Lucy J.
    Instructor
    Lucy is a Boulder girl who spent weekends at whatever ski mountain she could get a lift to. When the ski boots become too uncomfortable and her toes too cold she can't wait to slip her feet into some cycling shoes.

    Tell us a secret: It took me three tries to pass the driving test (good thing I cycle!)
    Favorite Dessert: Coffee ice cream with rainbow sprinkles
    When I'm not no a bike I'm: Trail running
    What I'm listening to: beats 1
  • Nicole A.
    Instructor
    An east coast transplant, totally infatuated with the mountains, Nicole A. finds it hard to stop moving. When she's not on a bike, running, climbing, or lifting something heavy, chances are good she's nerding out, up to her eyeballs in choreography, while her dog snores at her feet.

    Favorite Food: Anything involving bacon
    Favorite move on the bike: Tap Backs
    Words to live by: The journey is the destination.
    What I'm listening to: RIDE IT OUT (1)
  • Kelsey O.
    Instructor
    Born and raised in Boulder, Kelsey O. has always led an active lifestyle. Some of her favorite things (besides spinning) are horseback riding, kickboxing, yoga, and her Chihuahua.

    If you could have a super power, what would it be? Mind reading
    Tell me a secret. I know the Single Ladies dance
    Favorite move on the bike? Ab crunches for days!
    What I'm listening to: beat2
  • Tunde B.
    Instructor
    Tunde is a Coloradan native, but a California girl at heart. Her passion for play and fun is infectious!

    Tell us a secret? I used to be a Gogo dancer
    What was your first concert? New Kids on the Block
    Words to live by: Be the change.
    What I'm listening to: spin1
  • Morgan D.
    Instructor
    Morgan D. is originally from Evergreen, Colorado, but she says she grew up in a dance studio. She loves combining cycling and dance in her Beat Cycle classes, and dreams of traveling to at least 100 countries.

    If you could have a super power, what would it be? The ability to talk to animals
    What was your first concert? N'Sync
    Secret vice? Obnoxious amounts of prosciutto di parma
    What I'm listening to: BC Friday Mornings
